net.librec.recommender.content

Class HFTRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.recommender.TensorRecommender
      • net.librec.recommender.content.HFTRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recommender

    public class HFTRecommender
extends TensorRecommender
    HFT Recommender McAuley J, Leskovec J. Hidden factors and hidden topics: understanding rating dimensions with review text[C] Proceedings of the 7th ACM conference on Recommender systems. ACM, 2013: 165-172.
    Author:
    ChenXu

      • updateArray

        protected double[] updateArray(double[] oldValues,
                   double[] newValues)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Update function for thetas and phiks, check if softmax comes in to NaN and update the parameters.
        Parameters:
        oldValues - old values of the parameter
        newValues - new values to update the parameter
        Returns:
        the old values if new values contain NaN
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs

      • trainModel

        protected void trainModel()
        The training approach is SGD instead of L-BFGS, so it can be slow if the dataset is big.
        Specified by:

      • predict

        protected double predict(int[] indices)
        Description copied from class: TensorRecommender
        predict a specific rating for user userIdx on item itemIdx with some other contexts indices, note that the prediction is not bounded. It is useful for building models with no need to bound predictions.
        Specified by:
        predict in class TensorRecommender
        Parameters:
        indices - user index, item index and context indices
        Returns:
        predictive rating for user userIdx on item itemIdx with some other contexts indices without bound
